name: DOGO 2 (2018)
description:
A recreation of the first level from the game DOGO (Pixel Barons, 2017), a local-multiplayer, competitive platformer in which players compete in an ancient ritual to convert opposing cultures to their own alignment.

The creators of DOGO are two of my friends and past colleagues and provided me with assets from their game for me to recreate it in Unity (original game made in Game Maker).

The original game is a lot of fun and is available on Steam.

Disclaimer: This is not an official sequel to DOGO - only my playful attempt at recreating its gameplay.
